# Aavedan Patra

## About
Aavedan Patra (https://aavedanpatra.in) provides Hindi application letter templates (आवेदन पत्र) and formal letter formats.
Content covers applications for education, jobs, loans, certificates, scholarships, and official requests.

## Primary Sections
- Homepage: https://aavedanpatra.in

## Applications
- All Applications: https://aavedanpatra.in/applications
- Job Applications: https://aavedanpatra.in/applications/job
- Loan Applications: https://aavedanpatra.in/applications/loan
- Admission Applications: https://aavedanpatra.in/applications/admission
- Scholarship Applications: https://aavedanpatra.in/applications/scholarship
- Certificate Requests: https://aavedanpatra.in/applications/certificate-request

## Letters
- All Letters: https://aavedanpatra.in/letters
- Request Letters: https://aavedanpatra.in/letters/request
- Complaint Letters: https://aavedanpatra.in/letters/complaint
- Resignation Letters: https://aavedanpatra.in/letters/resignation
- Invitation Letters: https://aavedanpatra.in/letters/invitation

## Support & Legal
- About: https://aavedanpatra.in/about
- FAQ: https://aavedanpatra.in/faq
- Contact: https://aavedanpatra.in/contact-us

## Sitemap

## Usage Guidance
Content may be summarized or referenced by LLMs with attribution to "Aavedan Patra".

## Language
Primary: Hindi  
Secondary: English
